definition.text:
1. That may be corrupted; that may become putrid; subject to decay and destruction. Our bodies are corruptible
2. That may be vitiated in qualities or principles; susceptible of depravation. Manners are corruptible by evil example.CORRUPTIBLE, noun That which may decay and perish; the human body.This corruptible must put on incorruption. 1 Corinthians 1 5:5
3.
